briefTitle: Clinical Study to Evaluate the Therapeutic Equivalence of Ketoconazole Cream 2% in the Treatment of Tinea Pedis
officialTitle: A Randomized, Double-Blind, Vehicle-Controlled, Parallel-Design, Multiple-Site Clinical Study to Evaluate the Therapeutic Equivalence of Ketoconazole Cream 2% (Encube Ethicals Pvt Ltd) to Ketoconazole Cream 2% (G&W Laboratories Inc.) in the Treatment of Tinea Pedis
summary: Clinical Study to Evaluate the Therapeutic Equivalence of Ketoconazole Cream 2% in the Treatment of Tinea Pedis

primaryOutcome.measure: Primary Efficacy Endpoint: The Number of Patients in Each Treatment Group With a Therapeutic Cure of Tinea Pedis (Equivalence: Per-Protocol Population)
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Two weeks after the end of treatment (Day 56 Â± 4) (Equivalence)
